# 第一篇：滑动球体（Player-Controlled Motion ）

## 1控制位置

### 1.1设置场景

线性颜色空间及伽马颜色空间

[简述Unity线性空间和伽马空间](https://www.jianshu.com/p/964ffc5d3b9c)

摄像机投影模式

灯光阴影类型

TrailRenderer组件

cast shadows

width

### 1.2读取玩家输入

检索方向性方法 Input.GetAxis

项目设置的Input部分检查

### 1.3归一化输入向量

playerInput.Normalize();

### 1.4约束输入向量

Vector2.ClampMagnitude

## 2控制速度

设置渐进变化而不是突变

p1 = p0 + d

### 2.1相对运动

### 2.2速率

Time.deltaTime

### 2.3速度

[SerializeField,Range(0f,100f)]

### 2.4加速度

```

```

### 2.5所需速度

Mathf.MoveTowards

## 3约束位置

### 3.1留在正方形内

Rect allowedArea = new Rect(-5f,-5f,10f,10f)

### 3.2确切的位置

### 3.3消除速度

# 第二篇：物理（Pushing a Sphere Around）

## 1刚体

### 1.1 Rigidbody 组件

刚体

启用阴影

### 1.2掌控刚体速率

### 1.3无摩擦运动

创建物理材质以消除摩擦和反弹

修改 Collision Detection 防止穿透

修改 Constraints 冻结旋转

### 1.4 Fixed Update

Update保留检查输入并设置所需速度

速度的调整移至FixedUpdate

Interpolate 设置

E%0A%23%23%23%203.3%E6%B6%88%E9%99%A4%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%0A%23%23%23%203.4%E5%BC%B9%E8%B7%B3%0A%23%23%23%203.5%E5%87%8F%E5%B0%91%E5%BC%B9%E8%B7%B3%E9%87%8F%0A%0A%23%20%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E7%AF%87%EF%BC%9A%E7%89%A9%E7%90%86%EF%BC%88Pushing%20a%20Sphere%20Around%EF%BC%89%0A%23%23%201%E5%88%9A%E4%BD%93%0A%23%23%23%201.1%20Rigidbody%20%E7%BB%84%E4%BB%B6%0A%E5%88%9A%E4%BD%93%0A%E5%90%AF%E7%94%A8%E9%98%B4%E5%BD%B1%0A%23%23%23%201.2%E6%8E%8C%E6%8E%A7%E5%88%9A%E4%BD%93%E9%80%9F%E7%8E%87%0A%23%23%23%201.3%E6%97%A0%E6%91%A9%E6%93%A6%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%0A%E5%88%9B%E5%BB%BA%E7%89%A9%E7%90%86%E6%9D%90%E8%B4%A8%E4%BB%A5%E6%B6%88%E9%99%A4%E6%91%A9%E6%93%A6%E5%92%8C%E5%8F%8D%E5%BC%B9%0A%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9%20Collision%20Detection%20%E9%98%B2%E6%AD%A2%E7%A9%BF%E9%80%8F%0A%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9%20Constraints%20%E5%86%BB%E7%BB%93%E6%97%8B%E8%BD%AC%0A%23%23%23%201.4%20Fixed%20Update%0AUpdate%E4%BF%9D%E7%95%99%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%B9%B6%E8%AE%BE%E7%BD%AE%E6%89%80%E9%9C%80%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%0A%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%E7%9A%84%E8%B0%83%E6%95%B4%E7%A7%BB%E8%87%B3FixedUpdate%0A%0AInterpolate%20%E8%AE%BE%E7%BD%AE%0A%23%23%202%E8%B7%B3%E8%B7%83%0A%23%23%23%202.1%E8%B7%B3%E8%B7%83%E6%8C%87%E4%BB%A4%0A%23%23%23%202.2%E8%B7%B3%E8%B7%83%E9%AB%98%E5%BA%A6%0A%23%23%23%202.3%E5%9C%A8%E5%9C%B0%E9%9D%A2%E4%B8%8A%E8%B7%B3%E8%B7%83%0A%23%23%23%202.4%E4%B8%8D%E5%BA%94%E8%AF%A5%E6%9C%89%E6%9C%89%E5%A2%99%E8%B7%B3%E8%B7%83%0A%23%23%23%202.5%E7%A9%BA%E4%B8%AD%E8%B7%B3%E8%B7%83%0A%23%23%23%202.6%E9%99%90%E5%88%B6%E5%90%91%E4%B8%8A%E7%9A%84%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%0A%E7%9B%B4%E6%8E%A5%E6%8E%A7%E5%88%B6%E8%B7%B3%E8%B7%83%E9%AB%98%E5%BA%A6%0A%60%60%60math%0Av_y%20%3D%20%5Csqrt%7B%5Csmash%5Bb%5D%7B-2gh%7D%7D%0A%60%60%60%0A%23%23%23%202.7%E7%A9%BA%E6%B0%94%E7%A7%BB%E5%8A%A8%0A%23%23%203%E6%96%9C%E5%9D%A1%0A%23%23%23%203.1%20ProBuilder%E6%B5%8B%E8%AF%95%E5%9C%BA%E6%99%AF%0A%23%23%23%203.2%E6%96%9C%E5%9D%A1%E6%B5%8B%E8%AF%95%0A%23%23%23%203.3%E5%9C%B0%E9%9D%A2%E8%A7%92%E5%BA%A6%0A%23%23%23%203.4%E5%9C%A8%E6%96%9C%E5%9
